E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/25/1992
Subject: Tim Layana healing process
Tim Layana is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Don Peters
Dear Sir,
Don Peters has nothing more to prove at A Daytona Tortugas!
He has an ERA of 3.62 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Jeff Kent
Dear Sir,
Jeff Kent has nothing more to prove at AA Jacksonville Expos!
He has an AVG of .320 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Angel Echevarria
Dear Sir,
Angel Echevarria shouldn't play at AA Jacksonville Expos!
He has an AVG of .125 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Kinnis Pledger
Dear Sir,
Kinnis Pledger isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Jacksonville Expos!
He has an AVG of .112, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

me in the rotation?

Regards,
Mark Gardner
